title: vandEn un pAdAra
sahitya:
vandEn un pAdAravinda AdhAram tEDi sendUr sirandiDum kandA undanai nADi


anupallavi

  cintai sidaindiDavE nondiDum aDiyAr vanda bhayam enrAl adait-tandaruLvOnE


caraNam    arpamAna sukham tAn aLikkum Ashaikku nAn aDimaiyAgi mOsamuTru paDi mIdu tuDikkAdu
karpakam Aghumun porppadam pENum mati peTriDumAru karuNai uTriDa vENumayyA
